name: Chocolate Nutella Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 sticks of unsalted butter, room temperature 2 cups, plus 2 tablespoons of all-­‐purpose flour
3/4 cup of brown sugar 1/4 cup of unsweetened cocoa
3/4 cup of white sugar 1/2 tsp baking soda
1/2 teaspoon of vanilla 1 cup of chocolate chips
steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cream butter until light and fluffy. Add the sugars and Nutella then mix well, scrape down the
sides of the bowl to ensure even mixing. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating for 30 seconds between each. Add the
vanilla and mix for 10 seconds. Sift together the flour, cocoa, salt, and baking soda Add to the butter mixture, fold
in the chocolate chips and hazelnuts and refrigerate the dough for ten minutes. Spoon tablespoon-­‐sized drops of
dough onto cookie sheets. Bake at 350 for 10-­‐12 minutes. Allow to cool on the sheets for a minute or two before
transferring to a rack to finish cooling. Makes 6 dozen.
